comments.author: jrediger@mozilla.com
comments.creator: jrediger@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Posted on the issue:

Glean does _actively_ depend on `HttpURLConnectionClient` to [implement its uploader](https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/android-components/blob/208a9500f4024ad57e09a6633b180387b4263df8/components/service/glean/src/main/java/mozilla/components/service/glean/config/Configuration.kt#L7). [Same for experiments](https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/android-components/blob/208a9500f4024ad57e09a6633b180387b4263df8/components/service/experiments/src/main/java/mozilla/components/service/experiments/Configuration.kt#L8).

Both want to provide a default, so users don't need to care about it (but can still change it).

---

Let's see what Sebastian says.
